I was on Aredia for bone treatment because doc. though I had Mx to the bone.  So, I request a bone scan and the scan report says no evidence of osseous metastases.  However, doc wants me to continue to take bone treatment?  Does this make sense to anyone.. Just wondering if anyone has similar situations? Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2008 03:08PM Jlaw4545 wrote: thanks susan, I have been reading your posting, how are you with your treatment and hope you are feeling much better? I am actually just completeing my 6rd of a/c and I am due for testing in about a month.  However the last round just totally floored me and it's been 2wks and I have not been able to return to work.  SO then I asked my boss for wk from home and he decined and assured me that my job safe and said that I should applied for STD.  so, now that's what I will be doing just so I can get some income.   thank for your reply... how are you?
